column4: does any ubuntu users know how to get streaming video to work in firefox ?
what kind of videos are you trying to get working?
hello.. i can't get firefox to view video on bbc.co.uk or other sites
hey when I do apt-get install blah I get
Could not open lock file /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (13 Permission denied)
E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), are you root?
I would suggest installing helix player for linux
but now that I have installed it, it does not seem to load the videos it gives a 'bad transport error'
you can do sudo apt-cache search helix
Mr.Collins ok shall i uninstall any multimedia codecs first? and also MPlayer plugin for firefox?
should i uninstall MPlayer plugin for firefox before installing helix player?
